text: Nocardioides exalbidus is a rod-shaped and non-motile bacterium from the genus of Nocardioides which has been isolated from lichen on the Izu Ōshima Island on Japan. == References == == Further reading == * ==External links== *Type strain of Nocardioides exalbidus at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase exalbidus Category:Bacteria described in 2007
title: Nocardioides exalbidus
